visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a chart with the following specifications: Chart type: area and column. Chart title: 'Monthly Sales Data'. Axes and labels styling: Use a dark theme with white text for labels and titles. Data series: Series 1 (Area) with data [1, 4, 3, 5, 6] and Series 2 (Column) with data [2, 4, 1, 4, 4]. Custom colors: Use a gradient for the area series and a solid color for the column series. Additional configurations: Set chart margins, background, and legend position.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a chart with a dark theme, featuring both an area and a column series. The chart title is set to 'Monthly Sales Data' with white text and a font size of 20px. The x-axis and y-axis labels and titles are styled with white text and a font size of 14px and 16px, respectively. The data series includes an area series with data [1, 4, 3, 5, 6] and a column series with data [2, 4, 1, 4, 4]. The area series uses a gradient color from blue to gray, while the column series uses a solid gray color. The chart has custom margins set to provide space around the chart, and the legend is positioned at the top right with white text and a hover effect that changes the text color to light gray.
